title: The store doesn't work EVER

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: The store hasn't worked properly for around 2 months. When you try to access it it is either **very** slow, gives you a blank box, gives an error message, or shows nothing at all, about 90% of the time. It takes about 10 minutes of clicking back and forth to get the store to actually come up. I have talked to friends and they have the same problem. very annoying.{{champion:31}}

replies.body: I don't use internet explorer. I have a clean cash, and I still cant get into the shop. I've had this problem for over  a month. ALL of my friends are having this problem as well. Its not a black screen either. Sometimes its black and other times if I click back and forth on the tabs it WILL come up entirely. The main problem is the store won't let me buy anything. I can look at skins or champions if I do the stupid click back and forth a few times, but the RP purchase button does not work at all for me. I click it. It shows me click it. Nothing happens. If I try to buy the skin for my champion while I'm in que for a bot game (yes I thought to try that) it tries to tell me I don't own the champ though obviously I do because I'm in que to play the champ. If I go to my Summoner Profile any of my champs I click no longer show OWNED but instead say UNLOCK CHAMPION with question marks for the RP and IP value. This is NOT related to my computer. It is straight up a League issue. This started happening after their patch in December. PLEASE FIX IT SO I CAN GIVE YOU MY MONEY ALREADY! xD

Hey Rawk,

The error you're receiving is usually related to your Internet Explorer settings. Please check out the [Wrenchman's toolbox](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/sa8K7aTR-the-wrenchmens-toolbox-common-solutions-to-your-problems-accountstore-issues-more) as they provide a few steps that may resolve your issue!

If you're still having this problem after performing these steps, you should [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) through our support site!
All of you with difficulties should write a ticket in to support. There may be settings preventing you from accessing the store that are an easy fix.
Atleast with all of the store difficulties, you get to watch {{champion:55}} dance...

http://gyazo.com/1f4ee5f4d921ff7ff33ebc8c8aafbc9f

how long it takes to purchase when store is actually active, longer than gif.
Yeah, I have the same problem. They've known that the store has had problems for about a month now, but they haven't even started to fix them.
